title: OISY Sprinkles
oneLiner:
Earn BTC for being active—and now, for inviting friends.
Log in, make transactions, and hold tokens to qualify for daily drops. Refer a friend, and earn 10% of the value of their rewards for the entire campaign.
participateTitle: Earn BTC by staying active - and now by inviting others.
description:
Meet simple weekly requirements. Log in, make two transactions, and hold at least $20 in tokens to stay eligible for one of 50 BTC drops every day.
Now with referral rewards: invite a friend to deploy a wallet and earn 10% of their Sprinkles for 30 days. They keep 100% - you earn extra.

default.title: Congratulations on earning today’s OISY Sprinkles!
default.description: Share your victory on Twitter to qualify for another chance to earn.

jackpot.title: Congratulations on earning today’s largest OISY Sprinkles!
jackpot.description: Share your victory on Twitter to qualify for another chance to earn.

title: OISY Sprinkles
oneLiner:
Earn BTC for staying active—and now, earn guaranteed Sprinkles for referrals.
Log in, make transactions, and hold tokens to qualify for daily drops. Refer 4 friends and get rewarded directly. Top referrers win even more.
participateTitle: Earn BTC by staying active - and now by inviting others.
description:
Meet simple weekly requirements: log in, make two transactions, and hold at least $20 in tokens to stay eligible for up to $50 in BTC drops each day.
Now with referral rewards: invite a friend to set up a wallet and you’ll both earn guaranteed Sprinkles. Land in the top 4 referrers and win a jackpot.

default.title: You got rewarded
default.description:
Your rewards just landed in your wallet
Don't forget to refer and stay active to win more

jackpot.title: You've won the jackpot
jackpot.description:
You just earned our top Sprinkles Reward
Stay active, and keep referring to win more
